WorkItem.ClosedComment: You can now use the RecognizePrefixes method
WorkItem.Description:
I have dtos in my database with member names like ProjectCode and ProjectName. I need to map those to the destination members Code and Name.
I would like to instruct AutoMapper to also look for prefixed source members, and I want to specify the prefix once for the whole map.
WorkItem.Summary: Mapping source member by convention / prefix
